title: Shady Or Not PT 2: He Wants To Bring His Ex Wife On Vacation In Hawaii!
description:
He wanted to take his EX-WIFE on a vacation, and his girlfriend was *pissed*. Well, he's here today to share his side of the story! Whose side are you on?
